languages.text: {n}Шайрэнкхей ободряюще кладет руку на плечо Ирлиэт, но взгляд его устремлен к вам.{/n} "Наши провидцы... те, кого удалось спасти, не смогли определить точное расположение мастера плоти. Даже когда мы трижды облетели на кораблях весь мир, нечто мешало им узреть истину. Нечто... могущественное. Мы знали, что ваши патрули вскоре заметят наше присутствие. И потому решили поступить иначе — истребить гемункула вместе с миром, на котором он прячется".

traits.locale_text: {n}Саренрай ободряюще кладет руку на плечо Ирлиэт, но взгляд его устремлен к вам.{/n} "Наши провидцы... те, кого удалось спасти, не смогли определить точное расположение мастера плоти. Даже когда мы трижды облетели на кораблях весь мир, нечто мешало им узреть истину. Нечто... могущественное. Мы знали, что ваши патрули вскоре заметят наше присутствие. И потому решили поступить иначе — истребить гемункула вместе с миром, на котором он прячется".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei rests his hand on Yrliet's shoulder encouragingly, but he is looking at you.{/n} "Our Farseers... the ones we managed to save... could not name the exact location of the master of flesh. Even after our ships circled the world for a third time, something prevented them from seeing the truth. Something... powerful. We knew your patrols would soon discover our presence. And so we decided to do something else — to exterminate the Haemonculus along with the world he had chosen as his refuge."
languages.original_text: {n}Шайрэнкхей ободряюще кладет руку на плечо Ирлиэт, но взгляд его устремлен к вам.{/n} "Наши провидцы... те, кого удалось спасти, не смогли определить точное расположение мастера плоти. Даже когда мы трижды облетели на кораблях весь мир, нечто мешало им узреть истину. Нечто... могущественное. Мы знали, что ваши патрули вскоре заметят наше присутствие. И потому решили поступить иначе — истребить гемункула вместе с миром, на котором он прячется".

traits.locale_text: {n}Shairenkhei rests his hand on Yrliet's shoulder encouragingly, but he is looking at you.{/n} "Our seers... Those who we managed to save could not name the exact location of the flesh-sculptor. Even after our ships had circled the world for the third time, something prevented them from seeing the truth. Something... powerful. We knew your patrols would soon discover our presence. And so we decided to do something else — to exterminate the haemonculus alongside the world he had chosen as his refuge."

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei posa la mano sobre el hombro de Yrliet para darle ánimos, pero su mirada está fija en ti.{/n} «Nuestros videntes... los que pudimos salvar... no han sido capaces de precisar la ubicación del maestro de la carne. Nuestras naves han circunnavegado tres veces el planeta entero, pero algo ofusca la verdad a sus ojos. Algo... poderoso. Sabíamos que vuestras patrullas no tardarían en descubrir nuestra presencia, y por eso decidimos probar otra estrategia: exterminar al hemónculo junto con el planeta que había escogido como refugio».
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei rests his hand on Yrliet's shoulder encouragingly, but he is looking at you.{/n} "Our Farseers... the ones we managed to save... could not name the exact location of the master of flesh. Even after our ships circled the world for a third time, something prevented them from seeing the truth. Something... powerful. We knew your patrols would soon discover our presence. And so we decided to do something else — to exterminate the Haemonculus along with the world he had chosen as his refuge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shairenkhei posa la mano sobre el hombro de Yrliet para darle ánimos, pero su mirada está fija en ti.{/n} «Nuestros videntes... los que pudimos salvar... no han sido capaces de precisar la ubicación del modelador de carne. Nuestras naves han circunnavegado tres veces el planeta entero, pero algo ofusca la verdad a sus ojos. Algo... poderoso. Sabíamos que vuestras patrullas no tardarían en descubrir nuestra presencia, y por eso decidimos probar otra estrategia: exterminar al hemónculo junto con el planeta que había escogido como refugio».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}榭伦凯把手搭在伊莉耶特的肩膀上，鼓励着她，看着你。{/n}“我们的先知……我们救出的那些人，无法准确说出血肉大师的位置。我们的飞船绕着这颗行星飞了三圈，但某种东西在阻止他们看到真相。某种……强大的东西。我们早就意识到，你们的巡逻队很快就会发现我们，于是我们决定采取另一种方式。我们降落在了这个被血伶人当成避难所的世界，打算消灭他。”
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei rests his hand on Yrliet's shoulder encouragingly, but he is looking at you.{/n} "Our Farseers... the ones we managed to save... could not name the exact location of the master of flesh. Even after our ships circled the world for a third time, something prevented them from seeing the truth. Something... powerful. We knew your patrols would soon discover our presence. And so we decided to do something else — to exterminate the Haemonculus along with the world he had chosen as his refuge."

traits.locale_text: {n}榭伦凯把手搭在伊莉耶特的肩膀上，鼓励着她，看着你。{/n}“我们的先知……我们救出的那些人，无法准确说出血肉雕刻者的位置。我们的飞船绕着这颗行星飞了三圈，但某种东西在阻止他们看到真相。某种……强大的东西。我们早就意识到，你们的巡逻队很快就会发现我们，于是我们决定采取另一种方式。我们降落在了这个被血伶人当成避难所的世界，打算消灭他。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei pose la main sur l'épaule d'Yrliet pour l'encourager, mais c'est vous qu'il regarde.{/n} « Nos Grands Prophètes... Ceux que nous avons réussi à sauver... n'ont pas réussi à déterminer précisément où se trouvait le maître de la chair. Bien que nos vaisseaux aient fait le tour du monde trois fois, quelque chose les empêchait de localiser son repaire. Quelque chose de... puissant. Nous savions que vos patrouilles ne tarderaient pas à découvrir notre présence, c'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de changer de tactique, en exterminant l'hémoncule en même temps que le monde qu'il avait choisi pour refuge. »
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei rests his hand on Yrliet's shoulder encouragingly, but he is looking at you.{/n} "Our Farseers... the ones we managed to save... could not name the exact location of the master of flesh. Even after our ships circled the world for a third time, something prevented them from seeing the truth. Something... powerful. We knew your patrols would soon discover our presence. And so we decided to do something else — to exterminate the Haemonculus along with the world he had chosen as his refuge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shairenkhei pose la main sur l'épaule d'Yrliet pour l'encourager, mais c'est vous qu'il regarde.{/n} « Nos prophètes... Ceux que nous avons réussi à sauver n'ont pas réussi à déterminer précisément où se trouvait le sculpteur de chair. Bien que nos vaisseaux aient fait le tour du monde trois fois, quelque chose les empêchait de localiser son repaire. Quelque chose de... puissant. Nous savions que vos patrouilles ne tarderaient pas à découvrir notre présence, c'est pourquoi nous avons décidé de changer de tactique, en exterminant l'hémoncule en même temps que le monde qu'il avait choisi pour refuge. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}シャイレンケイは、ユリエットの肩に手をおいて励ましながら、あなたを見て告げる。{/n}「我々の先見司は…我々が救うことができた者は、屍肉の主の正確な居場所を知ることができなかった 。我らの船が世界を3周した後でさえ。何かが真実を見通すのを妨げているのだ。強力な…何かが。お前たちの巡視がすぐに我々の存在に気づくことはわかっていた。それで、我々は別のことをすることにした。それが、ハモンキュラスが隠れ家として選んだ世界もろとも、ハモンキュラスを滅ぼすことだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei rests his hand on Yrliet's shoulder encouragingly, but he is looking at you.{/n} "Our Farseers... the ones we managed to save... could not name the exact location of the master of flesh. Even after our ships circled the world for a third time, something prevented them from seeing the truth. Something... powerful. We knew your patrols would soon discover our presence. And so we decided to do something else — to exterminate the Haemonculus along with the world he had chosen as his refuge."

traits.locale_text: {n}シャイレンケイは、ユリエットの肩に手をおいて励ましながら、あなたを見て告げる。{/n}「我々の先見司は…我々が救うことができた者は、屍肉の主の正確な居場所を知ることができなかった 。我らの船が世界を3周した後でさえ。何かが真実を見通すのを妨げているのだ。強力な…何かが。お前たちの巡視がすぐに我々の存在に気づくことはわかっていた。それで、我々は別のことをすることにした。それが、ハモンキュラスが隠れ家として選んだ世界もろとも、ハモンキュラスを滅ぼすことだ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei legt seine Hand aufmunternd auf Yrliets Schulter, doch er blickt dich an.{/n} "Unsere Runenpropheten ... die, die wir retten konnten ... Sie konnten den genauen Standort des Meisters des Fleisches nicht benennen. Selbst, nachdem unsere Schiffe die Welt zum dritten Mal umrundet hatten, hinderte sie irgendetwas daran, die Wahrheit zu sehen. Etwas ... Mächtiges. Wir wussten, dass Eure Patrouillen unsere Anwesenheit bald bemerken würden. Und so haben wir entschieden, etwas anderes zu tun. Den Haemonculus zusammen mit der Welt, die er zu seiner Zuflucht auserkoren hatte, auszulöschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei rests his hand on Yrliet's shoulder encouragingly, but he is looking at you.{/n} "Our Farseers... the ones we managed to save... could not name the exact location of the master of flesh. Even after our ships circled the world for a third time, something prevented them from seeing the truth. Something... powerful. We knew your patrols would soon discover our presence. And so we decided to do something else — to exterminate the Haemonculus along with the world he had chosen as his refuge."

traits.locale_text: {n}Shairenkhei legt seine Hand aufmunternd auf Yrliets Schulter, doch er blickt dich an.{/n} "Unsere Seher ... die, die wir retten konnten ... Sie konnten den genauen Standort des Fleischbildhauers nicht benennen. Selbst, nachdem unsere Schiffe die Welt zum dritten Mal umrundet hatten, hinderte sie irgendetwas daran, die Wahrheit zu sehen. Etwas ... Mächtiges. Wir wussten, dass Eure Patrouillen unsere Anwesenheit bald bemerken würden. Und so haben wir entschieden, etwas anderes zu tun. Den Haemonculus zusammen mit der Welt, die er zu seiner Zuflucht auserkoren hatte, auszulöschen."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: {n}Shairenkhei, elini cesaret verircesine Yrliet'in omzuna atsa da bakışlarını sana doğrultuyor.{/n} "Ötesezenlerimiz... Kurtarmayı başarabildiklerimiz... Et üstadının tam olarak nerede olduğunu dile getiremediler. Gemilerimizle dünyayı üçüncü kez turladığımızda bile bir şeyler, hakikati görmemize engel oldu. Güçlü... Bir şeyler... Devriyelerinizin eninde sonunda varlığımızı keşfedeceklerinin farkındaydık. Biz de farklı bir şey yapmaya, sığınağı olarak seçtiği bu dünyayı Haimonkulus ile birlikte yok etmeye karar verdik."
languages.original_text: {n}Shairenkhei rests his hand on Yrliet's shoulder encouragingly, but he is looking at you.{/n} "Our Farseers... the ones we managed to save... could not name the exact location of the master of flesh. Even after our ships circled the world for a third time, something prevented them from seeing the truth. Something... powerful. We knew your patrols would soon discover our presence. And so we decided to do something else — to exterminate the Haemonculus along with the world he had chosen as his refuge."

Et üstadının tam olarak nerede olduğunu dile getiremediler. Gemilerimizle dünyayı üçüncü kez turladığımızda bile bir şeyler hakikati görmemize engel oldu. Güçlü... Bir şeyler... Devriyelerinizin eninde sonunda varlığımızı keşfedeceklerinin farkındaydık. Biz de farklı bir şey yapmaya, sığınağı olarak seçtiği bu dünyayı Haimonkulus ile birlikte yok etmeye karar verdik."
